channel.title: briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump pardons Democratic Rep. Henry Cuellar in shock move
item.description: President Trump on Wednesday announced he is granting a "full and unconditional PARDON" to Rep. Henry Cuellar (D-Texas), who was indicted last year on...

item.title: Cheers and alarm: 4 takeaways from the GOP's win in Tennessee
item.description: Republicans won Tennessee's hotly watched special U.S. House election Tuesday, but the single-digit margin in a conservative Nashville-area district w...

item.title: Mainstream reporting is dominant as ever — with Trump's help
item.description: President Trump came into office promising to decapitate mainstream media. He bullied and sued media companies, blocked or curtailed access for report...

item.title: "More lies from the speaker": Top Republicans erupt in rare public feud

item.title: Trump invites America's wealthiest to fund his presidency
item.description: Private wealth has become an operational arm of the Trump presidency, bankrolling pet projects and policies on a scale unmatched by any previous admin...

item.title: Republican wins special election in Trump country, as Democrat gains ground
item.description: The race in Tennessee’s ruby-red 7th Congressional District became more competitive than initially expected.

item.title: Family of Colombian man killed in U.S. boat strikes files formal complaint

item.title: How George Soros changed criminal justice in America
item.description: The liberal funder has spent tens of millions of dollars swinging dozens of district attorney races, drawing a backlash from the right.

item.title: Surprisingly tough Tennessee election reveals House GOP has base problem
item.description: A hard-fought victory in once-safe Republican territory came as polls show conservative support on the wane for GOP congressional majorities.

item.title: Pentagon watchdog’s ‘Signalgate’ findings expected within days

item.title: White House bullish on economic growth as Thanksgiving spending rises
item.description: Economic adviser Kevin Hassett dismissed economic bedwetters, saying strong spending bodes well for the economy.

item.title: Trump, stung by Republican losses, stands his ground on affordability
item.description: Democrats running on cost-of-living anxieties outperformed Republicans in Tuesday’s elections by greater-than-expected margins. The president chalked ...

item.title: Voters on Tuesday rewarded Democrats who addressed economic costs. Hours later, Trump said he delivered an 'economic miracle.'
item.description: A recent poll found a majority of Americans feel they’re spending more on groceries than they did a year ago.

item.title: Reaganomics in Jersey: Jack Ciattarelli has a supply-side dream if he’s elected governor this week
item.description: The Republican nominee has promised tax cuts and economic growth, but the numbers are fuzzy.

item.title: What to Know About China's DeepSeek AI
item.description: The Chinese upstart says it has trained high-performing AI models cheaply, without using the most advanced chips.

item.title: Reid Hoffman Raises $24.6 Million for AI Cancer-Research Startup
item.description: The LinkedIn co-founder is starting Manas AI with “The Emperor of All Maladies” author Siddhartha Mukherjee.

item.description: DeepSeek, SoFi and more in the latest Market Talks covering Technology, Media and Telecom.

item.title: Silicon Valley Is Raving About a Made-in-China AI Model
item.description: DeepSeek is called “amazing and impressive” despite working with less-advanced chips.

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
